page.title: 12Day in The Life(cont.)
page.content:
Evening interests include reading, music,computer programming and prestel Electronic mail is a fascinating hobby However my wife doesn't have the same enthusiasm.It is nevertheless fairly quiet and does not disturb her needlework.Claire may struggle with piano practice,space invaders,or a new guide badge before going to bed. When I am on duty for the practice,the evening and night is rather unpredictable.With responsibility for the health of nearly 20,000 patients,emergencies do occur.Once again micro_electronics and I am able to keep in touch with home by radio_pager.
(Written by Dr.R Harvey)
